channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: imo, dps him down to 0 before he starts to cast his big spell. problem solved.
item.content:encoded: imo, dps him down to 0 before he starts to cast his big spell. problem solved.

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Yeah, I loved that the only instructions I gave to the rogue were 'When he starts to cast his big spell, go stand on your spot', and he could not even duplicate that, so I made him just stand on it all the time while everyone else DPSed it down.
Crikey.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I loved that the only instructions I gave to the rogue were ‘When he starts to cast his big spell, go stand on your spot’, and he could not even duplicate that, so I made him just stand on it all the time while everyone else DPSed it down.

Crikey.

item.title: By: Val
item.dc:creator: Val
item.description: Yeah those lines between the people summoning forming a pentagram was pretty weird, but surely fun for an outdoor quest boss.
item.content:encoded: Yeah those lines between the people summoning forming a pentagram was pretty weird, but surely fun for an outdoor quest boss.

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Yeah, I saw that kind of skeleton thing in my raid yesterday not as fun when it's personal. LMAO
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I saw that kind of skeleton thing in my raid yesterday not as fun when it’s personal. LMAO

item.title: By: Feorian
item.dc:creator: Feorian
item.description:
Blades Edge Summoning circle.
Sort of weird polygon lines that totally dont look like they belong in WoW.
item.content:encoded:
Blades Edge Summoning circle.

Sort of weird polygon lines that totally dont look like they belong in WoW.

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: That's in Blade's Edge, not far from Netherstorm, the summoning circle for the Ogri'la chain. Very funky effects during that event.
item.content:encoded: That’s in Blade’s Edge, not far from Netherstorm, the summoning circle for the Ogri’la chain. Very funky effects during that event.
